allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit: WoWS Ballistics Calculator

Physics-based shell ballistics calculator for World of Warships.
Uses RK4 numerical integration to calculate flight times and impact angles
from shell properties scraped from shiptool.st.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add Artillery Plotting Room Mod 1 \(+16% range\) for USN BBs

- Add nation tracking from shell data tables
- Apply APRM1 multiplier \(1.16\) to U.S.A. battleships
- Add Alexander Nevsky ship name mapping \(Pr_84_Alexander_Nevsky\)
- Update pitch values and documentation to match actual config
- Fix range modifier documentation \(rangeBufferKm: 0.5\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
